name: Cleric
shortDescription: Divine agents who wield sacred magic in service of powerful deities.
description: Clerics are intermediaries between the mortal world and the divine. Through faith and devotion, they channel divine power to heal allies, smite foes, and uphold their deityâ€™s will.

spellcasting.description: Clerics prepare spells from the cleric spell list, channeling divine power through prayer and holy symbols.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast cleric spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Divine Domain
features.description: Choose a Divine Domain that represents the aspect of your deity you serve.

features.name: Channel Divinity
features.description: You can channel divine energy to fuel magical effects, starting with Turn Undead and a domain-specific option.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Destroy Undead
features.description: When an undead fails its saving throw against Turn Undead, it is instantly destroyed if its challenge rating is low enough.

features.name: Divine Domain Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your Divine Domain.

features.name: Divine Strike / Potent Spellcasting
features.description: Your Divine Domain grants you a damage-enhancing feature.

features.name: Divine Intervention
features.description: You can call on your deity for direct aid. The success chance is based on your cleric level.
